text: (tavada) ovun (tamangē niveshi) siṭiminma (yuddhayehi maraṇayaṭa pat vū) tamangē sahōdarayin gæna “ovunda apiva anugamanaya kara, (niveshi ræn̆dī) siṭiyehu nam, (yuddhayaṭa gos mesē) kapanu nolabannehuya” yayida pævasūha. (ebævin nabiyē!) oba mesē kiyanu: “(ættenma) oba satyaya pavasannan vaśayen siṭinnehu nam, (ovunva mokakda?) oba, obavama (puḷuvan nam) maraṇayen bērā ganu!”
